text: 3.17: Hos 12.8; Ru 12.21; 1 Ko 4.8Ndu khaŋ nzuai, “Gu ŋkɨɨa vhɨrve kav, gu bigi vhɨrve khar ki. Gu bigɨn the sosuagi fhuvara.” Nde maaŋ nzuai, nde fhuvara. Nde guigira za mbatɨgiap ki. Nde kha gumgi nde korar muunga tuktɨgi. Nde guigira bigi sosuagip, nden rɨmani mbatɨgim, nde vhɨra mbugumra ki. Nde maaŋ muuŋgiap kav, nde ne kaŋgi fhuvara. 3.17 Mbe wari won rɨmgi thugir, mbe wari gari. Mbe Raodisiaiŋ, mbe bigi vhɨrkɨvgi. Mbe Fhe Bakɨme rɨmani nɨman, ana mbe garim, mbe guigira bigi sosuagiap, fhɨreregap, bigi tivgiap wari ki. Nde vhɨra Vhagi Buni 2.9 ganɨri.
